title: Passenger train rams into pickup truck in Tripura’s Dhalai district; truck driver, 1 other dead
text:
A passenger train collided with a pickup truck at an unauthorised crossing in the Ambassa Manu section (Image generated by AI)

A passenger train collided with a pickup truck at an unauthorised crossing in the Ambassa Manu section of Tripura’s Dhalai district on Thursday. Two people, including the driver of the truck, died in the accident.

In a statement issued Thursday evening, Kapinjal Kishore Sharma, Chief Public Relations Officer (CPRO), Northeast Frontier Railway (NFR), said, “Information was received today at about 1:12 pm when DN 15663 Agartala-Silchar Express was passing in Ambassa-Manu section. Suddenly, a mini truck entered onto the track. The sudden entry of the mini truck onto the railway track resulted in the collision of the train with the truck, leading to the unfortunate reported casualty of the driver of the truck along with 1 other person…”
